references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper introduces Mip-NeRF, a significant advancement in neural radiance fields that addresses the problem of aliasing, improving the quality and efficiency of novel view synthesis.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: Building upon Mip-NeRF, this paper extends the approach to handle unbounded scenes, further enhancing the realism and scalability of neural radiance field rendering.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, a novel rendering technique that offers significant improvements in speed and efficiency compared to existing neural radiance field methods.

references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This seminal paper introduces neural radiance fields (NeRFs), a fundamental technique that revolutionized novel view synthesis, and serves as a foundation for many subsequent works in this field.

references.paper_title: Rethinking inductive biases for surface normal estimation
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel approach to surface normal estimation, which is crucial for high-quality 3D reconstruction, by rethinking inductive biases and achieving state-of-the-art performance.
